description: Despite a passionate performance from Colby Minifie and some compelling visuals, The Surrender sidelines its deft exploration of grief for drawn-out, pointless supernatural horror.

description: Legendary Pictures’ live-action Street Fighter movie is reportedly considering four big names as it kicks off the search for its cast.
title: Live-Action Street Fighter Movie: Roman Reigns, Jason Momoa, Noah Centineo, and Andrew Koji in Talks to Join Cast

author: Eric Van Allen
description: The Heart of Democracy update for Helldivers 2 has marked out a new battlefield on Super Earth itself. And it looks like Helldivers are jumping back on to help hold the line against the Illuminate invasion.
title: Helldivers 2 Sees Player Count Surge Alongside Heart of Democracy Update

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: As our exclusive IGN First coverage of Elden Ring Nightreign continues, we bring you our interview with game and combat designer Takuya Miyazawa. Enjoy!
title: How Elden Ring Nightreign's Combat Designer Aimed to Speed Up the Action – IGN First

author: Eric Song
description: AMD's best gaming processor has been out of stock since launch.
title: The Powerful AMD Zen 5 9950X3D Gaming CPU Is Finally Back in Stock on Amazon

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has discussed Mario Kart World's fan-favourite new character, Cow, and shown off the piece of concept art that secured her place in the game as a playable character.
title: Nintendo Reveals 'Silly Sketch' of Mario Kart World Cow That Led to the Game's Best New Character Becoming Playable

author: Tom Phillips
description: Sony has announced an end to its PlayStation Stars loyalty program, less than three years after its launch.
title: PlayStation Stars Loyalty Program Shutdown Announced After 3 Years

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Lies of P: Overture doesn’t play with the Pinocchio-inspired soulslike's formula too much, but in our hands-on we found that the new ingredients it added, like the great new weapon types and fabulously freaky monsters, proved that there's never really too much of a good thing, even if it is largely the same thing.
title: Lies of P: Overture Wears its Bloodborne Inspiration Proudly on its Sleeve

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Microsoft has announced Retro Classics with Game Pass, a collaboration with Antstream Arcade to bring a collection of over 50 classic Activision games from the 80s and 90s to Game Pass members.
title: Microsoft Announces Retro Classics With Game Pass, Kicks Things Off With Over 50 Activision Games From the 80s and 90s

author: Lex Briscuso
description: She played what’s considered one of the most iconic characters in the Game of Thrones universe, but it wasn’t exactly an easy start for Milly Alcock. The Australian actress, who plays the young version of Rhaenyra Targaryen in the spinoff series House of the Dragon, recently revealed that someone in a position of power told her she would have to participate in acting coaching following her second day on set.
title: Milly Alcock Reveals 'Someone Very High Up' Told Her She Needed an Acting Coach on the House of the Dragon Set

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Sony has revealed an upcoming PlayStation 5 and PC game called Mukti, which it signed as part of its Sony India Hero Project. Check out the first gameplay.
title: Sony Signs Deal for Mukti, a First-Person Story Exploration Game Set in an Indian Museum Coming to PS5 and PC

author: Erik Adams
description: Highest 2 Lowest features an enormously theatrical Denzel Washington and the kind of wild tonal swings only Spike Lee can manage.
title: Highest 2 Lowest Review

author: Dan Stapleton
title: Monster Train 2 Review

author: Bo Moore
description: Samsung has released its yearly update to its flagship soundbar, and while the HW-Q990F is excellent in nearly every way, it finds itself running into the problem that many top-of-the-line products before it have faced. How can each new edition separate itself from the last?
title: Samsung HW-Q990F Review

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Marvel's Fantastic Four series has been one of the best comics on the stands for a while now. Here's why there's never been a better time to dive into the book as the FF gear up for their MCU debut.
title: Why There's Never Been a Better Time to Start Reading Marvel's Fantastic Four

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Earlier this year, we received confirmation that Donkey Kong's fresh new look wasn't just for the Super Mario Bros. Movie. Love it or hate it, that's your business, but now Shigeru Miyamoto has finally told us why the great ape got a makeover in the first place.
title: Why Nintendo Redesigned Donkey Kong, According to Shigeru Miyamoto

author: Tom Phillips
description: Switch 2 launch title Mario Kart World was originally in development more than five years ago, solely for the original Nintendo Switch.
title: Mario Kart World Began Development on Switch 1 and Suffered Performance Struggles, Until Switch 2 Delay Offered 'Ray of Hope'

author: Chris Reed
description: The complete series of Star Trek: The Next Generation has dropped to an all-time low price at Walmart, but it might not last long.
title: Star Trek: The Next Generation Just Dropped to $80 on Blu-ray

author: Tom Phillips
description: Xbox console exclusive Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 will come to PlayStation 5 this summer in an Enhanced Edition with new features, Microsoft has announced.
title: Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 Enhanced Edition Announced for PS5, With Added Features and PS5 Pro Support

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Microsoft has announced the Xbox Game Pass May 2025 Wave 2 lineup, which is headlined by Metaphor ReFantazio, Tom Clancy’s The Division 2, and To a T.
title: Xbox Game Pass May 2025 Wave 2 Lineup Confirmed

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion: Remastered launched in a not-so-surprising shadow drop at the tail end of the month, and in just one week managed to vastly outsell the original Oblivion's first 15 months on the market.
title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered Massively Outsold the Original Oblivion in the U.S. in its First Month

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The backlash to Randy Pitchford’s controversial Borderlands 4 $80 comment has leveled up, with video game publishers jumping on the bandwagon to promote their games. Meanwhile, Pitchford himself has pointed to previous comments he made about Borderlands 4's price, declaring: "If you want the truth, here it is."
title: Amid Backlash to $80 Borderlands 4 'If You’re a Real Fan' Comment, Randy Pitchford Points to Previous Statement: 'If You Want the Truth, Here It Is'

author: Tom Phillips
description: The upcoming Narnia reboot from Barbie movie writer and director Greta Gerwig has added Carey Mulligan to its growing cast.
title: Barbie Director's Narnia Reboot Adds Carey Mulligan to Its Cast

author: Ben Williams
description: Spider-Man Magic: The Gathering cards are back in stock at Amazon, including the 30-pack display boxes and the special Scene Box.
title: Amazon Has Restocked Spider-Man Magic: The Gathering Sealed Booster Boxes Today

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: IGN interviews Nintendo legend Shigeru Miyamoto on Super Nintendo World, Switch 2, and his love of Pikmin.
title: The Big Shigeru Miyamoto Interview: 'I See Nintendo as Like a Talent Agency and We Have Within Our Roster a Lot of Talented Characters'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Avowed director Carrie Patel has quit legendary RPG company Obsidian Entertainment, just months after its most recent game's launch.
title: Avowed Director Quits Obsidian After More Than a Decade for Job at Netflix-Owned Oxenfree Studio

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has showcased its revamped look for Diddy Kong, after previously changing the company's decades-old design for his bigger pal Donkey Kong.
title: After Redesigning Donkey Kong, Nintendo Has Tweaked Another Classic Character — and Here's Our Best Look Yet

author: Robert Anderson
title: These 100W Power Banks Just Got Massive Discounts in the Early Memorial Day Sales at Amazon

author: Christian Wait
description: As of May 21, the Pokémon TCG Slashing Legends Tin is $29.87 at Amazon, but top Journey Together singles are far cheaper on TCG Player. Meanwhile, Magic: The Gathering’s Marvel Spider-Man Play Booster Box is back up for preorder at Amazon for $189.99.
title: Deals For Today: Slashing Legends Pokémon Tin Back in Stock at Amazon for $30

author: Tom Phillips
description: Pokémon Go has unveiled a new $100 Premier Access ticket upgrade option for its upcoming Go Fest: Jersey City event that unlocks in-game items and access to real-world improved facilities — including "upgraded restrooms."
title: Pokémon Go Introducing a $100 Ticket Upgrade That Gets You Into a Better Toilet

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Doom: The Dark Ages has seen 3 million players since coming out last week, but Bethesda has yet to announce a sales figure.
title: Doom: The Dark Ages 'The Biggest Launch in id's History' — but No Sales Figure Yet

author: Eric Van Allen
description: An invasion of Super Earth is underway in Helldivers 2's latest update, bringing the once-distant frontlines of conflict close to home. Amid the chaos of the invasion, Helldivers were informed that the Illuminate have razed the neighboring planet of Mars, and players are already eager for some payback over it.
title: Helldivers 2 Players Are Ready For Revenge After Illuminate Invasion Razes Mars

author: Ben Williams
description: Amazon has plenty of third-party Switch 2 accessories already available, with many at a discount. Here are the best early picks that are actually worth your money.
title: Best Switch 2 Deals: Amazon Has Some Big Discounts on Third-Party Carry Cases Ahead of Memorial Day

author: Michael Cripe
description: Fortnite has made its long-awaited return to the U.S. Apple App Store for iPhone and iPad users.
title: Fortnite Is Finally Back on the U.S. Apple App Store

author: Jacqueline Thomas
title: The AMD Radeon RX 9060 XT Is Finally Confirmed

author: Adam Mathew
description: There’s never been a better time to give your games library a spring clean and make room for some banger new titles.
